column2: PRIVACY STATEMENT    OUR COMMITMENT TO PROTECTING YOUR PRIVACY Community Coffee Company respects your right to privacy and is committed to protecting it. In our site, we give you opportunities to provide your name, address, email and other relevant information that we use to give you a more personalized shopping experience and to make ordering and reordering easier for you. We do not sell or trade customer information with others for use on their mailing lists.

THE PROTECTION OF YOUR PERSONAL ACCOUNT INFORMATION When you place an order on our site, it is placed through a secure server. This server encrypts all information you input before it is sent. Once your personal information is received, we protect it against unauthorized use.
